item.title: (Planned Project) News Summaries
item.description: This is a project I plan to tackle here in the near future. I plan to web scrape news articles and the use machine learning to summarize them. An added bonuses feature I might try is to see if I could try and check the articles for false news.

item.title: Briggs Personality Predictor
item.description: Used a dataset found on Kaggle that had a personality type and social media posts Using tensorflow and keras created a model to predict a personality given the social media posts. The current highest accuracy is around 20%, so there is definite room for improvement. Link to Github Repository

item.title: SnakeAI
item.description: This project is still a work in progress I have created the game of snake using Python and the pygame library I begin implementing the A* algorithm to find the shortest path to the next snack after each snack is eaten I plan to begin working on a neural network to learn to play the game automatically Link to Github Repository

item.title: Database Systems Final Project
item.description: Collaborated with two other students to create a library application Front-end is written in C# and the database is SQL Allows users to check-in, checkout, and put items on hold Link to Github Repository

item.title: Object Oriented Programming Final Project
item.description: Wrote this project in C# using Object-Oriented techniques to create classes and other data structures Wrote unit tests to test every part of backend code Wrote both a front-end application and web-page using Razor Pages Link to Github Repository
